task.title: Install and Run Jenkins
task.shortdesc: What we're going to do: Install and run Jenkins and the required Jenkins plugins. create Jenkins jobs to build pdf files with the DITA-OT.

step.cmd: Download the Jenkins distribution package from https://jenkins.io/download/ and unpack the zip file.
Right-click and run the installer as administrator, and select to continue as administrator.
When Jenkins installs, open a browser and navigate to localhost:8080, then follow the instructions for initial login.

info.note: Use localhost:8080/safeRestart if you installed the Jenkins plugins without restarting.
